title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 114.5 - Hours for public inspection and copying
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 114.5 - Hours for public inspection and copying

State Regulations

The department shall accept requests for records and
produce records from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m. Monday through Friday. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
114.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
